scripts.build: npm run dl-common && npm run babel
scripts.start-local: export GITHUB_API_URI=http://localhost:9956 && export CLOUD_URI=http://localhost:9967 && export ARMB_1_URI=http://192.168.1.101:9978 && export APP_PATH=$PWD && npm start
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && babel src --out-dir dist && npm run make-public
scripts.dl-common: rm -rf prep.sh && wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ironman9967/iron-iot-common/master/scripts/prep.sh && chmod +x prep.sh && ./prep.sh && rm -rf prep.sh
scripts.release: chmod +x ./common/scripts/release.sh && ./common/scripts/release.sh v$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.release-patch: npm run bump -- patch && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm run bump -- minor && npm run release
